directions: Bring the chicken stock, water, ginger, garlic, and soy sauce to a simmer in a large pot over medium-high heat. Stir in the chicken, and return to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low, and continue simmering until the chicken is tender and no longer pink on the inside, about 15 minutes.
Stir in the snow peas and carrot, and simmer 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms, and continue simmering until the vegetables are tender, about 3 minutes. Stir in the green onions, and serve.
ingredients: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed
1/4 pound fresh snow peas, trimmed and halved
title: Easy Japanese Steakhouse Soup
